amendment.description: Amendment makes technical changes to the environmental review requirements and the reversionary language contained in the bill.
amendment.purpose: Amendment printed in H.Rept. 106-515 to clarify land conveyance and reversionary language and to include the Secretary of the Interior as a joint lead agency for environmental review.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hansen amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 417 - 3 (Roll no. 36).
